Name: Brugzicht
Review Text: Friendly locals and staff, and good prices for drinks. You can smoke inside, and they have a dart board, pool table, and gambling machines

Name: Brugzicht
Review Text: Racist guys. The bar was open at 19h on a Saturday but me and a mate were told that bar is closing. This happened twice!! Not once but twice!!!!!
